about_the_game:
Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru, the irresistible puzzle game that seduces you with sexy Nekomimi!

🧩 Swapping and Rotating Puzzles

  • Engage in two classic puzzle modes, each offering unique challenges and rewarding you with additional Nekomimi to play with!

🌟 16 FREE Nekomimi's

  • Explore a diverse collection of 16 captivating Nekomimi, all available for FREE!

🔥 Unleash the Full Collection

  • Immerse yourself in the ultimate Nekomimi extravaganza with a staggering collection of 641 captivating Nekomimi, all included in the bundle!
    Take advantage of an exclusive discount that allows you to gather the entire Nekomimi collection at an irresistible price!

📷 High Quality Nekomimi

  • Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of naughty Nekomimi all in glorious 4K resolution!

🖼️ Nekomimi Gallery

  • Dive into an easy-to-use gallery and marvel at the stunning and seductive Nekomimi up close and personal!

❤️ Favourites System

  • Instantly access your most cherished Nekomimi by marking them as favorites, ensuring quick and easy access!

🎵 Chill Music

  • Embark on your Nekomimi adventures accompanied by a soothing selection of chill music, creating the perfect ambiance for your gameplay!

Prepare to be seduced by the sultry Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru who await you, as you succumb to the intoxicating blend of stimulating puzzles and the Nekomimi's irresistible charm, leaving you yearning for more!

content_descriptors.notes: Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru has graphic sexual content including nudity, sex, genitalia, bondage, sex toys, bodily fluids, tentacles & masturbation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Immerse yourself in Hentai Senpai: Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru, a FREE puzzle game featuring 16 sexy Nekomimi all in stunning 4K. Swap, rotate, and unlock new Nekomimi to play with. Prepare to be seduced by the sultry Sukebe Nekomimi no Yoru who await you!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
